articles.author: Matthew Keck
articles.title: Health department announces Indiana's first 2 flu-related deaths of the season - WLKY Louisville
articles.description: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention recommends everyone aged 6 months and older get a flu vaccine.
articles.content:
INDIANA —Indiana has had its first two flu-related deaths of the season.
The Indiana Department of Health made the announcement on Thursday, but did not give any information regarding the deaths, in… [+652 chars]
